oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-11-11 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of an aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on November 11, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Oklahoma Songbirds; Hiram Higsby; Ann Bond; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening theme and statements / (1:30) Hiram Higsby opens the show / (1:50) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Dragging The Bow" / (2:54) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (4:14) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "I’ll Go Riding Down That Old Texas Trail" / (6:14) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:45) Hiram Higsby performs "I Left Her Standing There (With A Doodad In Her Hair)" / (8:33) Hiram Higsby, Allan Page, and Ann Bond tell a joke through a skit / (9:47) Ann Bond performs "Fireball Mail" / (11:29) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (12:06) Dick Reinhart performs "Don’t Fence Me In" / (14:03) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (16:24) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Bond, Ann; Reinhart, Dick;
